casebody.data:
In the Matter of a Trust Created by Margaret E. GURNEY, Deceased. Carolyn Renner, etc., Respondent; St. Mary's Roman Catholic Church, et al., Appellants, Hartwick College et al., Respondents. No. 2017-880. Court of Appeals of New York. Nov. 20, 2017.

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
